attributes.title: Awful app!
attributes.review: I was so disappointed with the quality of this app!🗿🗿😡😡😡 When I opened this app I was greeted with a very ugly racist Cheeto with a croissant toupee!!!! 🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮I was so scared 😱😱😱I dropped my phone and then my cat saw the image and now she is dead 🙀🙀🙀🙀we cremated her but when I was holding her ashes⚱️⚱️  I opened my phone and I AGAIN SAW 🤢🤮🤮😱😱😭😭😭😭the horrendous Cheeto with dementia I was startled 😱 so dropped my cats ashes into the toilet bowl😾😾😾! I went into shock👁👄👁 and passed out and now I have mental scars...😭😭😭 I am currently crying because I have nothing to remember my cat. 😭😭😭😢😢😢This app is a danger to people’s pets, and the photos on it are extremely disturbing, this app ruined my life!!! 🤬🤬🤬😡😡😡😭😭😰😨😱ᗷᑌᑎKᗴᖇ ᗷOYᔕ ugliness killed my cat and scarred me!!! 🤮🤮😾😾😭😭So this app is very 🧚🏼✨𝑁𝑜 𝐵𝑢ᗴᑎO✨🧚🏼 PERIODDDDTT 😭🧚🏼💅💅💅

attributes.title: nO
attributes.review: this app gave my mother breast cancer. rip mom miss u the most 💔😢 my dad has gum cancer because he was trying to be like trump’s hillbilly followers and chew tobacco 😞 some relatives on my dad’s side went to the tulsa rally because trump promoted it on this app and got covid and gave it to my little sister and my big brother, took them both out 😭 i have the permanent smell of cheeto and racism stuck in my nose because i developed a software where you could smell people through your phone, and i looked at a picture of donald trump 🍊👃🏻 the spray tan seeping off his sweaty wrinkled skin permanently stained all of the walls in the white house, so we might as well start calling it the orange house 🏡 i had to end up deleting this app because all the typos gave me dyslexia, rip my eyesight 😞✌🏻👀

attributes.title: i hate this app ❤️😩
attributes.review: i opened the app and this virus showed up. SO i deleted rq and then got it again. and boom it did it again. so i restarted everything and then opened it one more time then it started glitching. 😩😩oh no! this is NOT my fav app atm. it is so bad. i do not recommend getting this nasty app. also when i was looking in the app and this hot cheetos man popped up screaming. LIKE YELLING AT ME. for no reason. i think it was part of the virus. 😡DELETE THIS APP NOW. it’s not worth it. that cheeto man scared the H E L L out of me. now my child will have nightmares for days and so WILL I!!!!!!! and when i deleted the app, it kept charging me 100 dollars!!?!?!?! this app is crazy🤪😡. please do not GET THIS APP. I WILL SAY IT AGAIN. do NOT purchase this app. apple needs to delete this whole app of everyone phones.

attributes.title: THIS APP BROKE UP ME AND MY BF
attributes.review:
I was at my boyfriend’s house the other day and we were just hanging out like normal. He went to go take a shower and I heard his phone ding so I told him he had a text message; he asked if I could respond back saying he was busy and would talk to the person later. I unlocked his phone (we shared our passwords with each other, so I never thought he would betray me like this), and that’s when I saw the truth. He had this Donald Trump app downloaded on his phone!!!!!!! I proceeded to confront him and we had the biggest argument of our entire relationship. I found out he was an avid Trump supporter, and my heart literally shattered. I would’ve rather him cheated than this.
This app forced me to break up with the love of my life...AND I’D DO IT AGAIN! ADIOS BRAD CHAD!!

attributes.title: I had to get a new fridge because of this app!!!!!!!!
attributes.review:
Do NOT download this app, it seriously is a home wrecker and more importantly a fridge destroyer!!! I had to replace my $3,000 fridge after I downloaded this app and the app caused my fridge to malfunction and break while I was on vacation and it spoiled my 18 pounds of raw beef which is for my cat!!!! I am very displeased with this app. The energy waves which it emitted forced their way into my fridges coolant compressed and caused it to break spoiling the raw cat beef food and making my entire house smell very bad!!🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬 this is making me very angry and I WILL be speaking to the manager of the company that made this app and be seeking compensation.
I am VERY upset. I am calling upon Apple to remove this app from the AppStore and so no one else will be affected by this terrible app.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to educate myself on trump,, but after A 3 DAY DOWNLOAD my phone started to glitch! as reading the reviews i started to dislike this app,, some strange things happened when i got the app😳 i remember i had seen a 🍊 headed man with hair the shape of a messed up 🍌 peel and let me tell you I WAS FRIGHTENED 😱 the man was banging on my door “OPEN UP, VOTE TRUMP, GIVE 5 STARS” OH BOY I WAS 😡 TRUMP IS A CRAZY MAN!!! i simply got this app to overlook our president just like the rest of the karen’s supporting him in the reviews,, but i must say this app took DAYS to download, it also makes my phone glitch, but also our own very president has showed me the reason WHY i am NOT VOTING for this terrible, racist (wait is it racist or rapist? 🤔 OH yea it’s both nevermind) rapist, 🍊 looking 👀, banana 🍌 peel haired man😸

attributes.title: Donald Trump‘s app review
attributes.review: This is the worst app in history, it should be taken off the Apple store immediately. it literally makes the App Store looks so weak and trash. And i’m not here for this Apple please get this off the App Store, and as a paying customer for new devices every year I would like this app off the App Store immediately this orange face man scared the crap out of me when I open up the app and it took two weeks to download and I have Xfinity fast speed. Plus this orange face man that we have as a president and that we’re all ashamed of having him as our president we all know he’s clearly cheated in the election. Anyways back on topic he tried to get rid of my favorite app TikTok that such a good app for teenagers, and I do not stand for this orange piece of crap

attributes.title: It’s extremely bad
attributes.review:
Let’s see where do I start? First, it took days to download I couldn’t wait to write this review and say how bad this app is! Second, I tried to get tickets to his rally so I couldn’t go but it’s said it was unavailable to give me a ticket!! Third, it keeps glitching and returning me to my home screen, unacceptable. Fourth, I do not support Trump but I really wanted to see why he is a good president for our country, I couldn’t seem to find any good reasons. Fifth, the app kept bugging me every two seconds I was on the app, it kept saying, “vote for Trump” and every time I said “never ask me again” it kept popping up. I am extremely disappointed in this app and I hope it gets kicked off the App Store smh.

Oh yeah, Tiktok. That’s all I’m gonna say

attributes.title: The horrible things this orange has done to me.
attributes.review: This man. Our so called “president?” Has done horrible things to my family and my dog. So i will now get into it. I saw him in person in Washington DC and he was a very horrible person. First of all, i brought my dog with me.. and he ate my dog. He also picked up my little brother and threw him into a wall. He also stubbed my big toe and called my mother an orangutang. My mother is not in fact an orangutang. He sicked the military dogs on me after i called him a cheeto with string cheese on him head. Also he never even said sorry for eating my dog. It was not a pleasant experience and This app told to to drive into a lake and now my car is in a lake and my goodie baskets were in it. Donald trump if you are reading this don’t ever f with gen z again.

attributes.title: Hugeeeee(Donald trump voice)
attributes.review: Bro I downloaded this app cuz I wanted to stay in contact with the big orange man himself but instead it just made my feet stink and I was like wth then I saw my hair was slowly coming off my scalp it was like a wig eventually I saw that my toes where turning orange just like the big orange man I was scared when I was going to delete the app 5 big oranges came for me and held me hostage then I see the big orange man in front of me but lucky my hamster knows judo and he came to the rescue I don’t recommend this app to anyone I wouldn’t want no one to go through what I did stay safe don’t let the big orange man take you and don’t download this app unless you want to get kidnapped by oranges and who knows what could have happened if my hamster wasn’t their
